title: Do modern people ever get buried with weapons? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why not? Some folks get buried with all sorts of possessions.  Aurora Schuck is buried with her prized possession, her 1976 Cadillac given to her by her husband. She was buried in Riverside Cemetery in Aurora Woman Buried With Her Prized Cadillac Buried with weapons, at least they’s fit in the coffin. There are no laws I know of prohibiting the practice. Though there could be some local prohibitions. You never know how CA, New York City, MD, Chicago interpretes their gun control laws, so check first (though the mortuary should know).
When my grandfather passed away, we buried him with his Singer Sewing Machine 1911 issued to him by the USMC in 1950.
